attributes.action: First Aid Lessons For All Students
attributes.additional_details:
-140,000 people die each year in situations where first aid could have helped save their lives
-You have an 80% chance of needing to use First-Aid on a friend or family member
-59% of people in the UK said that they wouldn't feel confident to attempt to save a life
-Less than 1 in 10 people have first aid training
attributes.background:
First aiders can be the difference between life and death. Every year
around 140,000 people die in situations where first aid could have helped save their lives; yet fewer than 1 in 10 people have been trained in first aid. First aid is a life lesson everyone should learn!
